text:
[Verse]
Woke up in the morning light
City life ain't yet in sight
Dreams of nights that never end
Wishin' for a chance again

[Verse 2]
Running fast without a care
Chasing dreams but unaware
Skyscrapers and starry skies
See the world through different eyes

[Chorus]
Dreamer in the city
Lights they shine so pretty
Lost but never lonely
Feeling like the only

[Verse 3]
Colors flashing in the rain
Heartbeats sync with subway trains
Every alley tells a tale
Of the ones who never fail

[Verse 4]
Nighttime comes the city wakes
Neon glow and cityscapes
Everyone's a dreamer here
Living life without a fear

[Chorus]
Dreamer in the city
Lights they shine so pretty
Lost but never lonely
Feeling like the only
title: Dreamer in the City
